function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Prescriptive view may not effectively optimize resources for disease mitigation in the built environment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Predictive approaches may not accurately anticipate the future impact and likelihood of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding about supply chain interactions and effects among stakeholders","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of multi-disciplinary workgroups to address prioritized needs and problems in supply chain management","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruptions in production due to decreasing availability of essential raw materials and staff","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in demand patterns leading to disruptions in distribution and scm","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of agility and adaptability in traditional companies with products or demand that do not change continuously","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in supply chain network design","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on just-in-time manufacturing philosophy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-collaborative structures in supply chain","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on supply chains","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on nox-, sox-related emissions and particle matter","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of closed-loop supply chains and circular economy models in certain sectors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation due to lack of health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental impact leading to resource depletion and waste generation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of knowledge-based systems for training and knowledge management","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate performance evaluation for long-term sustainability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Characteristics of the supply chain, including logistic operations, network structure, dynamics, and complexity, determine the way major external disruptions may change performance within the supply chain.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interactions among risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in global and local supply chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Volatile economic situations affecting manufacturing risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global disruptions impacting supply chains at operational, tactical, and strategic levels","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Qualitative research dominance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of supply chain structure disease outbreaks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of supply chain structure and organization may create vulnerabilities to contagious disease also indicate potential hotspots for contagion.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High concentration of publications in specific journals may indicate a narrow focus on certain risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bias in the selection of data sources for the bibliometric analysis may skew the interpretation of research trends and priorities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exponential growth of published works between 2017 and 2020","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of papers not relevant to
